definitions.definition: A practical joke or mischievous trick.
definitions.example: He pulled a gruesome prank on his sister.

definitions.definition: An evil deed; a malicious trick, an act of cruel deception.
To perform a practical joke on; to trick.
To call someone's phone and promptly hang up
definitions.example: Hey man, prank me when you wanna get picked up.

definitions.definition: To adorn in a showy manner; to dress or equip ostentatiously.
